pkgmetadata.longdescription: Loading a JAGS Module for the Piecewise Exponential Distribution // Load the Just Another Gibbs Sampling (JAGS) module 'pexm'. The module provides the tools to work with the Piecewise Exponential (PE) distribution in a Bayesian model with the corresponding Markov Chain Monte Carlo algorithm (Gibbs Sampling) implemented via JAGS. Details about the module implementation can be found in Mayrink et al. (2021) doi:10.18637/jss.v100.i08.
